custom-sql.sql: SELECT (CASE WHEN sum(researchobjectid) >0 THEN true ELSE false END ) as check FROM public.gfbio_primarydata_researchobject WHERE researchobjectid = ? AND researchobjectversion = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY researchobjectid ORDER BY researchobjectversion DESC) AS pos FROM public.gfbio_researchobject WHERE researchobjectid in ( SELECT gfbio_primarydata_researchobject.researchobjectid FROM public.gfbio_primarydata_researchobject WHERE gfbio_primarydata_researchobject.primarydataid = ? )AND researchobjectversion in ( SELECT gfbio_primarydata_researchobject.researchobjectversion FROM public.gfbio_primarydata_researchobject WHERE gfbio_primarydata_researchobject.primarydataid = ? ) )AS iq WHERE pos=1
